Uses of Package
org.transitime.monitoring

  • Packages that use org.transitime.monitoring 
    Package Description
    org.transitime.api.data
    This package contains the classes for the objects that are serialized into JSON or XML.
    org.transitime.ipc.data
    This package contains the low-level objects that are transmitted to the clients via RMI.
    org.transitime.monitoring
    For monitoring system to make sure that it is up and working correctly.
  • Classes in org.transitime.monitoring used by org.transitime.api.data 
    Class and Description
    MonitorResult
    Contains status for an individual monitor.
  • Classes in org.transitime.monitoring used by org.transitime.ipc.data 
    Class and Description
    MonitorResult
    Contains status for an individual monitor.
  • Classes in org.transitime.monitoring used by org.transitime.monitoring 
    Class and Description
    AgencyMonitor
    For monitoring whether the core system is working properly.
    MonitorBase
    Base class for doing monitoring.
    MonitorResult
    Contains status for an individual monitor.
